actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-898.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 148 - 261 (Record Vote No: 316).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5973) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5973 (Department of the Interior and related agencies funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 5973) making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1985, and for other purposes.
